name: 10.01.Attributs et balises de mise en forme

sections.code:
* {
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

[role]:not([role="navigation"],[role="main"],[role="banner"],[role="contentinfo"],[role="search"],[role="heading"],[role="img"],[role="alert"],[role="log"],[role="status"],[role="progressbar"]){
    margin: 0.5em 0!important;
    padding: 0 0.5em!important;
    border: 2px solid red!important;
}

[aria-activedescendant],
[aria-autocomplete],
[aria-busy],
[aria-checked],
[aria-colcount],
[aria-colindex],
[aria-colspan],
[aria-controls],
[aria-current],
[aria-describedby],
[aria-details],
[aria-disabled],
[aria-dropeffect],
[aria-errormessage],
[aria-expanded],
[aria-flowto],
[aria-grabbed],
[aria-haspopup],
[aria-hidden],
[aria-invalid],
[aria-keyshortcuts],
[aria-label],
[aria-labelledby],
[aria-modal],
[aria-multiline],
[aria-multiselectable],
[aria-orientation],
[aria-owns],
[aria-placeholder],
[aria-posinset],
[aria-pressed],
[aria-relevant],
[aria-readonly],
[aria-required],
[aria-roledescription],
[aria-rowcount],
[aria-rowindex],
[aria-rowspan],
[aria-selected],
[aria-setsize],
[aria-sort],
[aria-valuemax],
[aria-valuemin],
[aria-valuenow],
[aria-valuetext] {
    margin: 0.5em 0!important;
    padding: 0 0.5em!important;
    border: 2px solid green!important;
}

[aria-activedescendant]:before,
[aria-atomic]:before,
[aria-autocomplete]:before,
[aria-busy]:before,
[aria-checked]:before,
[aria-colcount]:before,
[aria-colindex]:before,
[aria-colspan]:before,
[aria-controls]:before,
[aria-current]:before,
[aria-describedby]:before,
[aria-details]:before,
[aria-disabled]:before,
[aria-dropeffect]:before,
[aria-errormessage]:before,
[aria-expanded]:before,
[aria-flowto]:before,
[aria-grabbed]:before,
[aria-haspopup]:before,
[aria-hidden]:before,
[aria-invalid]:before,
[aria-keyshortcuts]:before,
[aria-label]:before,
[aria-labelledby]:before,
[aria-live]:before,
[aria-modal]:before,
[aria-multiline]:before,
[aria-multiselectable]:before,
[aria-orientation]:before,
[aria-owns]:before,
[aria-placeholder]:before,
[aria-posinset]:before,
[aria-pressed]:before,
[aria-relevant]:before,
[aria-readonly]:before,
[aria-required]:before,
[aria-roledescription]:before,
[aria-rowcount]:before,
[aria-rowindex]:before,
[aria-rowspan]:before,
[aria-selected]:before,
[aria-setsize]:before,
[aria-sort]:before,
[aria-valuemax]:before,
[aria-valuemin]:before,
[aria-valuenow]:before,
[aria-valuetext]:before {
    content: "aria properties"!important;
}

[role]:not([role="navigation"],[role="main"],[role="banner"],[role="contentinfo"],[role="search"],[role="heading"],[role="img"],[role="alert"],[role="log"],[role="status"],[role="progressbar"]):before {
    content: 'role="'attr(role)'"'!important;
}

:not([role="navigation"],[role="main"],[role="banner"],[role="contentinfo"],[role="search"],[role="heading"],[role="img"],[role="alert"],[role="log"],[role="status"],[role="progressbar"])[aria-label]:before {
    content: 'aria-label="'attr(aria-label)'"'!important;
}
[role]:not([role="navigation"],[role="main"],[role="banner"],[role="contentinfo"],[role="search"],[role="heading"],[role="img"],[role="alert"],[role="log"],[role="status"],[role="progressbar"])[aria-label]:before {
    content: 'role="'attr(role)'" aria-label="'attr(aria-label)'"'!important;
}
:not([role="navigation"],[role="main"],[role="banner"],[role="contentinfo"],[role="search"],[role="heading"],[role="img"],[role="alert"],[role="log"],[role="status"],[role="progressbar"])[aria-labelledby]:before {
    content: 'aria-labelledby="'attr(aria-labelledby)'"'!important;
}
[role]:not([role="navigation"],[role="main"],[role="banner"],[role="contentinfo"],[role="search"],[role="heading"],[role="img"],[role="alert"],[role="log"],[role="status"],[role="progressbar"])[aria-labelledby]:before {
    content: 'role="'attr(role)'" aria-labelledby="'attr(aria-labelledby)'"'!important;
}
:not:not([role="navigation"],[role="main"],[role="banner"],[role="contentinfo"],[role="search"],[role="heading"],[role="img"],[role="alert"],[role="log"],[role="status"],[role="progressbar"]):before {
    content: 'aria-describedby="'attr(aria-describedby)'"'!important;
}
[role]:not([role="navigation"],[role="main"],[role="banner"],[role="contentinfo"],[role="search"],[role="heading"],[role="img"],[role="alert"],[role="log"],[role="status"],[role="progressbar"])[aria-describedby]:before {
    content: 'role="'attr(role)'" aria-describedby="'attr(aria-describedby)'"'!important;
}
body *:focus{outline:5px solid orange!important}

name: 05. Tableaux

sections.code: body{color:red}
